descriptionHtml:
Well, the Shield of Solitude is maybe not the best but one of the nicest pieces of equidment in Skyrim. But it looks too dull.
So I\'ve simply made this mod that replaces the shields model and texture with better versions.

The new shield texture was made with some textures from the web (wooden and leather part) and shares the design with the solitude banner.
The actual Solitude guard shield remains the way it is.

_____________________________________________________________________________________
Mesh and original texture here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5916
author: ImJustAGamer
